definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
lit. (bamboo) splits when it meets the knife's edge (idiom)/fig. easily solved
lit. no blood on the men's swords (idiom); fig. an effortless victory
to edge a knife, scissor, sword etc
to kill with one's own hand

sentences.english: He decided to go into politics despite his lineage as much as because of it, family members said.
sentences.chinese: 家人说，家世对于他从政的决定是双面刃。

sentences.english: A short, heavy arrow with a thick head, used especially with a crossbow.
sentences.chinese: 一种发自石弓的四面刃头的箭。

sentences.english: Make me please with the blade of butchering the dragon?
sentences.chinese: 要我用屠龙之刃来请吗？

sentences.english: When roughing with the insert not peripheral cutting edge.
sentences.chinese: 粗加工时没有使用外切刃带有波纹的刀具。

sentences.english: Tough the sword hidden among his pinions may wound you.
sentences.chinese: 虽然那藏在羽翼中间的剑刃也许会伤毁你们。

sentences.english: Let not the sword-blade mock its handle for being blunt.
sentences.chinese: 不要让剑刃讥笑剑柄的钝拙。

sentences.english: The cutting edge roundness can make chip curling radii larger.
sentences.chinese: 切削刃钝圆一般能使切屑卷曲半径增大。

sentences.english: The adoption of four-sideedge shearing blade prolongs the service life of blade.
sentences.chinese: 采用四面刃的剪切刀片，提高了刀具的使用寿命。

sentences.english: The captain slid aside, his blade flashing.
sentences.chinese: 船长滑到一边，他的剑刃寒光闪闪。

sentences.english: The sidelong edge is an important composition part of the rotary blade.
sentences.chinese: 正切刃是旋耕刀的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: His lightsaber found his hand and blue energy flared .
sentences.chinese: 他的光剑被吸到手中，一根蓝色能量刃闪烁刺出。

sentences.english: The curve-edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.chinese: 曲线刃滚切刀是用来加工护翼卫生巾的专用刀具。

sentences.english: He took it down and drew his blade.
sentences.chinese: 他取下剑抽出刃，精钢摩擦着皮革。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a optimization method of pinion cutter for cutting helical gears.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种斜齿插齿刀的刃形优化方法。

sentences.english: The billhook was originally developed from a farming tool, and consists of an axe and hook on the end of a long pole.
sentences.chinese: 钩镰最初起源于农具，其长柄顶端置有斧刃和利钩。

sentences.english: The top view micrographs show the cutting edge and the rake face of the tools.
sentences.chinese: 俯视显微照片显示了刀具的切削刃和前刀面。

definition: double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool
handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
